teaser: On his own “The Dick Cavett Show,” talk show icon Dick Cavett traded stories and witticisms with everyone from Grouch Marx to John Lennon. He’s now a featured columnist for The New York Times. When he joined us to share his host-ly manners tips, he also gave us this tip for impersonating Alfred Hitchcock.
